item.title: Choux filled Custard and Strawberry Jam
item.description: A delicious little treat that is easy as long as we have time to prepare it in advance. This is often the case in French baking!

item.title: Tian of Summer Vegetables and Goat Cheese
item.description: This seasonal dish is full of summer vegetables and is a change to the classical ratatouille.

item.title: Madeleine
item.description: This pastry is a synonym for me (and Proust) of childhood when I would eat go√ªter back from school.

item.title: Spinach and Goat Cheese Quiche
item.description: This is a basic recipe for shortcrust pastry, which can be used for sweet tarts or savory quiche.

item.title: Shortcrust pastry
item.description: This is a basic recipe for shortcrust pastry, which can be used for sweet tarts or savory quiche.

item.title: Korean Beef
item.description: This korean-inspired dish is a staple in my home. The flavors are very addictive and it is very simple and fast to make. Perfect for a weeknight dinner!
